classes.components

Class Carecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.components.Carecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recorder, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Carecorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Recorder, java.lang.Cloneable
    Immutable object also called caretaker. It knows how, why and when to store and restore these originators CopyRecordable, CutRecordable SelectionRecordable, PasteRecordable DeleteRecordable, InsertRecordable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Pair<Memento,Recordable>> container
      Internal object inside which we store Memento objects.
      private boolean recordingState
      boolean controls whether the recording is on or not.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Carecorder()
      Instanciate an internal object that will store the Memento.

      This object is mainly used for testing purposes.

      When storing mementos, the caretaker puts them in a immutable object Pair .

      Sets On the action of replaying.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • container

        private java.util.List<Pair<Memento,Recordable>> container
        Internal object inside which we store Memento objects. This object is never to be accessed from external objects.

      • recordingState

        private boolean recordingState
        boolean controls whether the recording is on or not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Carecorder

        public Carecorder()
        Instanciate an internal object that will store the Memento. A list in this case List . A the creation of the caretaker the recording state must be off . Preferred Constructor .

    • Method Detail

      • record

        public void record(Memento memento,
                   Recordable recordable)
            throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        When storing mementos, the caretaker puts them in a immutable object Pair . The key of the pair is a Memento . The value of the pair is a Recordable .
        Parameters:
        memento - stored by the caretaker .
        recordable - the originator associated with the memento .
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

      • replay

        public void replay()
        Sets On the action of replaying. At this point, we restore the mementos to their originators. replay cannot execute while recording.

      • setrecording

        public void setrecording()
        Sets the action of recording on. The container of mementos must be cleared each time a recording session starts. Otherwise we would play past recordings.

      • isRecording

        private boolean isRecording()
        Returns:
        boolean true if the recording state is on, false otherwise.

      • stoprecording

        public void stoprecording()
        Stops the action of recording by modifying to false the boolean. that controls the recording state.

      • careclone

        public java.util.List careclone()
                         throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        This object is mainly used for testing purposes.
        Returns:
        a shallow copy of the object that contains the mementos.
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
